segments.text: I notice the adult woman in her apron, so absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wiping down that plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware that the sink behind her is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours out, hitting the floor with a splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is already wet, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined from the moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting my gaze, I see the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's teetering as he reaches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll tumble right off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches with her arm extended, hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems worlds away from this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but worry about the slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
